ModMetaData.name: LBE's Australian Wildlife
ModMetaData.author: LachlanEaston
ModMetaData.description: Adds animals native to Australia. For A Dog Said compatibility download the A Dog Said Easy Patcher. Done: [*]Wombats [*]Koalas [*]Echidnas [*]Red Kangaroos [*]Grey Kangaroos Planned (in no particular order): [*]Wallabies [*]Dingos [*]Tasmanian Devils [*]Tasmanian Tigers [*]Drop Bears [*]Quolls [*]Frilled Neck Lizards [*]Blue Tongue Lizards [*][strike]Platypuses[/strike] [strike]Platypi[/strike] [strike]Platypodes[/strike] [*]More than one Platypus [*]Ringtail and Brushtail Possums [*]Quokkas [*]Thorny Devils [*]Tree Kangaroos [*]Wattle and Gum Trees
